entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 9:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
